text: Driven is the lead single from the album Alpha by the heavy metal band Sevendust. "Driven" was the band's highest charting single (matched only by "Enemy"), peaking at #10 on the Mainstream Rock Charts,[ Billboard.com], Sevendust Singles Chart and since surpassed only by "Unraveling", which peaked at #7. ==Music video== The music video, which was shot in Haverhill, Massachusetts during the band's rehearsal for their 2007 tour, features rare behind-the-scenes footage of the band's members as they prepare material from their sixth album Alpha. The video debuted nationwide on March 3 and was featured on the "Headbangers Ball" program on cable channel MTV2 on March 10."Sevendust Driven music video" Goodheartmedia.com. Retrieved on June 19, 2009. ==Appearances== The song appeared in the 2007 THQ video game WWE SmackDown vs. Raw 2008 and also another song from this album Feed was in the game. Also "Driven" featured in a promo for the WWE film The Condemned. ==Charts== {| class="wikitable" !Chart (2007) !Peak position |- |US Mainstream Rock Tracks |align="center"|10 |- |} ==References== Category:2007 singles Category:Sevendust songs Category:Songs written by Morgan Rose Category:Songs written by John Connolly (musician) Category:Asylum Records singles Category:2007 songs Category:Songs written by Vinnie Hornsby
title: Driven (Sevendust song)
